import React, { FC, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Form, Input, Image, Select, Switch, Upload, message, DatePicker, Col, Row, } from "antd"; import { FormInstance } from "antd/es/form"; import { Resident } from "../../services/resident/model"; import { UploadOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons"; import { diskStorage } from "multer"; import ResidencesService from "../../services/resident"; import { post } from "../../services/base/fetch"; import moment from "moment"; import dayjs from "../../utils/dayjs"; const ResidentForm: FC<{ form: FormInstance; obj?: Resident }> = ({ form, obj, }) => { const normFile = (e: any) => { if (Array.isArray(e)) { return e; } return e && e.fileList; }; useEffect(() => { if (obj) { form.setFieldsValue(obj); } else { form.resetFields(); } }, [obj]); const onChange = async ({ file }: any) => { console.log(file); const res = await post("/api/resident/image", { image: file, } as any); console.log(res); }; return (
{obj?.image !== undefined ? ( !obj?.image.includes(".png") ? ( ) : (

) ) : ( )}
); }; export default ResidentForm;
